timeline.name: Took a Risk!
timeline.description: Hang up my lab coat genetically editing cells and decided to teach myself how to code.

timeline.name: Square Enix
timeline.description: Chosen as an apprentice developer at a legendary video game company, I contributed to quirky marketing websites and level-up to become a proactive front-end developer

timeline.name: Infura (Consensys)
timeline.description: Jump into the world of blockchain and web3 by joining the industry-leading crypto-infrustructure company. Contributed significantly to improvement of the SAAS web app's UI/UX enginer

timeline.name: Solo Travel in Latin America
timeline.description: Took a career break travelling Latin America solo, volunteering and and Spanish.

timeline.name: New Opportunity?
timeline.description: Now looking for my next adventure!
